Value.label: Wake up 10 minutes when batteries are inserted
Value.Help: Stay awake for 10 minutes after batteries are inserted

Value.label: On time
Value.Help: How long should the device associated to multi sensor keep state On before sending it Off command (if the value is bigger than 255, the value would be rounded to next integer in minutes)

Value.label: Enable Motion Sensor
Value.Help: Enable Motion Sensor

Value.label: Command Options
Value.Help: Which commands to send when PIR motion sensor triggered

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 3. Bitsets: 0 -> Battery report, 5 -> Temperature, 6 -> Humidity, 7 -> Luminosity

Value.label: Reset #111-113
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 111-113. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1. 1 to 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2. 1 to 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3. 1 to 2678400 seconds

Value.label: Reset to default
Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults.

Value.label: Multilevel Sensor Report Command
Value.Help: The content of "Multilevel Sensor Report Command" after SEI receives "Multilevel Sensor Get Command".

Value.label: Make SEI blink
Value.Help: Configuration Value 1 is to Specify the time that SEI need blink (0-255), the unit is second; Configuration Value 2 is to Specify the Cycle of on/off (0-255), the unit of it is 0.1 second.

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4(lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Device tag
Value.Help: Device tag.

Value.label: Reset device
Value.Help: Reset to the default configuration.

Value.label: Over current protection
Value.Help: Output Load will be turned off automatically after 30 seconds and if the current overrun 1.5A.

Value.label: Over heat protection
Value.Help: Output load will be closed after 30 seconds if the temperature inside the product exceeds 100C.

Value.label: Status re-power on
Value.Help: Configure the output load status after re-power on

Item.label: The last status before the power outage

Value.label: Notification report association group 1
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1 when the state of output load is changed

Item.label: Send Hail CC when using the manual switch to change the load state

Value.label: Notification report using the external switch 1
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 3 when using the external switch 1 to switch the loads

Value.label: Notification report using the external switch 2
Value.Help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 4 when using the external switch 2 to switch the loads

Value.label: State appointment 1
Value.Help: State appointment Set the ON time of output load. Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun). Value2 = ON (hour) Value3 = ON (minute) Value4 = ON (brightness level)

Value.label: State appointment 2
Value.Help: State appointment Set the ON time of output load. Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun). Value2 = ON (hour) Value3 = ON (minute) Value4 = ON (brightness level)

Value.label: Enable/disable the parameter 91 and 92
Value.Help: Enables/disables parameter 91 and 92

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 current bit 2 voltage bit 1 watt bit 0 kWh

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 current bit 2 voltage bit 1 watt bit 0 kWh

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 1 is meter report for voltage. 2 is meter report for current. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 current bit 2 voltage bit 1 watt bit 0 kWh

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Set the external switch mode for S1
Value.Help: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

Value.label: Set the external switch mode for S2
Value.Help: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

Value.label: Touch panel port state
Value.Help: Get the state of touch panel port

Value.label: Control destination for external switch S1
Value.Help: Set the control destination for external switch S1

Item.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

Value.label: Control destination for external switch S2
Value.Help: Set the control destination for external switch S2

Item.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

Value.label: Default dimming rate
Value.Help: Set the default dimming rate

Value.label: Current working mode
Value.Help: Get the current working mode

Value.label: Dimming principle
Value.Help: Set the dimming principle

Value.label: Type of load
Value.Help: To get what type of load the Dimmer is connected to

Value.label: Min brightness level
Value.Help: Set the min brightness level that the load can reach to

Value.label: Max brightness level
Value.Help: Set the max brightness level that the load can reach to

Value.label: Recognition way of load
Value.Help: Set the recognition way of load

Item.label: Never recognize the load when power on
Only recognize once when first power on
Recognize the load once power on

Value.label: Configuration Locked
Value.Help: Enable/disable Configuration Locked

Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network

Value.label: Report type
Value.Help: Defines the contents of Multilevel Sensor Report after Multilevel Sensor Get received.

Value.label: Blinking behavior
Value.Help: This is actually a double byte value. The LSB defines the total time the device needs to blink in seconds. The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blink in tenths of seconds.

Value.label: Notification status
Value.Help: Enables automatic notifications to associated devices whenever there is a state change.

Value.label: Enable Wattage Reports
Value.Help: Enable/disable Wattage threshold and percent.

Value.label: Wattage threshold
Value.Help: The minimum change in wattage for a report to be sent.

Value.label: Wattage threshold percent
Value.Help: Minimum change in percent of wattage to send a report.

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default. Reverts to 0 after set.

Value.label: Report type G1
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type G2
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type G3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Default Group Time
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send interval G1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send interval G2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send interval G3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Device tag
Value.Help: Device tag.

Value.label: Reset device
Value.Help: Reset to the default configuration.

Value.label: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Value.Help: Default setting: Open: FF, Close: 00

Value.label: Enable wake up 10 minutes when the power is switched on.
Value.Help: Default setting: Disable

Value.label: Toggle the basic set value when Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Value.Help: Default setting: Open: FF, Close: 00

Value.label: Determines which report will be sent when Magnet switch is opened/ closed.
Value.Help: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1. Bitsets: 0->Battery report, 4->Sensor Binary, 8->Basic Set, Default setting: 0x00000100 (Basic Set) Ideal Setting for OZW is 17 (Sensor Binary and Battery Report)

Value.label: Device Tag
Value.Help: Device Tag

Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults.

Value.label: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened/closed.
Value.Help: Default setting: Open: FF, Close: 00

Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically. The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically. The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Device tag
Value.Help: Device tag.

Value.label: Reset device
Value.Help: Reset to the default configuration.
